attribs.name: ability_checks_query_var
attribs.current: ?{Ability Check|Strength +5,{{title=Strength Check}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + 5[str]]]}}|Dexterity +0,{{title=Dexterity Check}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + 0[dex]]]}}|Constitution +3,{{title=Constitution Check}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + 3[con]]]}}|Intelligence -3,{{title=Intelligence Check}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + -3[int]]]}}|Wisdom +1,{{title=Wisdom Check}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + 1[wis]]]}}|Charisma -2,{{title=Charisma Check}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + -2[cha]]]}}}

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KJYOdvwiHOp0IyLh3iK_display_text
attribs.current: The Bear has advantage on Wisdom (perception) checks the rely on smell.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KJYOu0DJH7PdNRQ3S1l_display_text
attribs.current: When the bear's rider hits with a weapon attack, the bear can make a bite attack against a creature within 5ft as a bonus action.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KJYP8SZMGvr3BZlWYGw_display_text
attribs.current: The bear has advantage on Constitution saving throws

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KJYPIKh5vOVBTjNY-kg_display_text
attribs.current: The bear makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws

attribs.name: saving_throw_query_var
attribs.current: ?{Saving Throw|Strength +5,{{title=Strength Saving throw}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + 5[str]]]}}|Dexterity +0,{{title=Dexterity Saving throw}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + 0[dex]]]}}|Constitution +3,{{title=Constitution Saving throw}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + 3[con]]]}}|Intelligence -3,{{title=Intelligence Saving throw}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + -3[int]]]}}|Wisdom +1,{{title=Wisdom Saving throw}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + 1[wis]]]}}|Charisma -2,{{title=Charisma Saving throw}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + -2[cha]]]}}|Death +0, {{title=Death Saving throw}} {{death_saving_throw_chances=@{death_saving_throw_chances}}} {{death_saving_throw_successes=@{death_saving_throw_successes}}} {{death_saving_throw_failures=@{death_saving_throw_failures}}} {{roll1=[[@{shaped_d20}@{d20_mod} + ]]}}}
